name: bendalloy
description: Bendalloy is a mysterious and dynamic alloy created by precisely combining cadmium, zinc, and silver. Its shifting hues and volatile properties make it a material of both scientific intrigue and advanced technological potential.

allomancy.description: Allows {PAWN} to speed up time in a bubble around the user.

feruchemy.description: Stores nutrition, allowing users to go without food.

store.description: This pawn is storing nutrition in a bendalloy metalmind. Their metabolism speeds up dramatically, burning through food reserves at an accelerated rate. They become hungry faster and must eat more to maintain energy — but the nutrition is preserved for future emergencies.

tap.description: This pawn is tapping an atium metalmind, reversing the effects of time. Their body becomes younger, stronger, and faster — regaining agility, endurance, and resilience as if years were stripped away.
